body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play a Merfolk Looter
2. play another Merfolk Looter
3. let summoning sickness expire What is the expected output? What do you see instead? you should be able to tap both merfolk looter to draw a card, then discard, but instead, only one of them is avaible. However, both can attack as expected. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.40, win 7 home If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below. I've avoided attaching the log, because nothing useful is here (I've checked it). Also, I noticed the same bug happens with regenerate (tried out with Odious Tow), so I suppose it's a system bug.
